blog.name: alexandro-lima
blog.title: Alexandro Lima - Ilustrador
blog.description: Olá, bem vindo ao meu blog! Sou um ilustrador/arte finalista publicitário com larga experiência de mercado. Considero como seus “mestres inspiradores” Will Eisner, Jack Kirby, John Buscema e Canini. Sou um apreciador de quadrinhos, utilizo muito desta que é considerada a nona arte como fonte de referência para muitos de seus trabalhos.Mesclo trabalho à mão com vetorização e colorização digital em meus trabalhos. Realizo ilustrações, caricaturas, logotipos e pinturas. Este blog tem o objetivo de mostrar o que mais atual ando produzindo. Divulgue e opine!

summary:
Capitão América  Heróis Renascem - Steve Rogers

Revista Captain America V2 #01 - 1996

Heróis Renascem foi uma tentativa de...
caption:
Capitão América Heróis Renascem - Steve Rogers

Revista Captain America V2 #01 - 1996

Heróis Renascem foi uma tentativa de reiniciar as histórias do Capitão América, Vingadores, Homem de Ferro, Quarteto Fantástico e Vingadores após a “morte” dos heróis no evento Massacre Marvel, que foi publicada no Brasil nos anos de 1998 e 1999. Não há muito a se dizer dessa fase, tanto que nesse período o personagem foi apelidado pelos leitores de “Capeitão”, pelos péssimos desenhos.

www.alexandrolima.com.br

#capitaoamerica

title: Breathe No More
body:
How did you go from there to have him buried between your legs?

Too Sharp To Put Back Together

The psychiatrist’s office is probably the worst place ever to meet someone.But it was where it happened.How did you go from there to have him buried between your legs it was another matter…

Read more…

blog.name: thefandomimagine
blog.title: The Fandom Imagine
blog.description: Buy Me A Coffee Patreon Page WARNING:These tags do include NSFW posts Marvel Doctor Who Harry Potter LOTR Sherlock Supernatural Star Wars OUAT Teen Wolf DC Others Oneshots Aesthetic Fake Texts Headcanons Moodboards NSFW An imagines blog for any and all fandoms. Please note that I do not own any of the gifs used and if you see any of your own gifs, then message me and I will happily put your name in the tags, to give credit where credit is due or remove it if that is what you wish. You are always welcome to write stories based on any of the imagines I myself will do gif imagines, fake texts, aesthetics and headcanons. However any oneshots on the blog are wrote by followers. If you wish to submit a oneshot idea than I will post it to everyone, however it is up to them if it is actually published. NSFW posts are published on the last Sunday of the month. All fandoms are welcome.

blog.name: sarcastictonystark
blog.title: Directing Science Disneyland
blog.description: You have reached the tumblr of Tony Stark. After making Banner get a blog here I finally gave in and made a public one myself. Ask me things or just enjoy the show, choice is yours. I check the tag "sarcastictonystark" and you can @tag me Not currently accepting M!As Currently accepting compliments None of the images are mine, just the words between them. Discord Join Link Links for mobile users: FAQ • Headcanons • Just the asks • Ko-fi

blog.name: ao3feed-clintxnat
blog.title: love is for children, i owe him a debt.
blog.description: This blog is an automated list of all fic posted on the Archive Of Our Own under the Clint Barton/Natasha Romanov pairing tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed using an IFTTT recipe, but this was made easy thanks to astolat (astolat.tumblr.com). If you would like to set up a similar blog, see the instructions tab :) To check announcements regarding these blogs, go to the tumblr tag #ao3feed announcement. (moderated by enjolbutt.tumblr.com) I hope this blog helps when you are in dire need of feels or a laugh, so enjoy! :)

title: Butterfly Wings and Guitar Strings
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2QXmvUT

by thestoriesinmyhead95

The Avengers are the biggest rock band in the world, but you’ve never been a fan. That is until your best friend Helen Cho wins back stage passes to their concert in Vegas. While she’s making heart eyes at the drummer Thor, you’re falling for their lead guitarist Bucky Barnes.

Words: 5182, Chapters: 4/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Marvel Cinematic Universe, The Avengers (Marvel Movies), Marvel
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Categories: F/M
  • Characters: James “Bucky” Barnes, Clint Barton, Reader, Steve Rogers, Tony Stark, Helen Cho, Thor
  • Relationships: James “Bucky” Barnes/Reader, Clint Barton/Natasha Romanov, Steve Rogers/Tony Stark
  • Additional Tags: Alternate Universe - Rock Band, plus size reader, what happens in vegas, doesn’t stay in vegas, Shot gun wedding???, Or is that when there’s a baby??, They get married after meeting like once, Bucky is a rock star, The Avengers is a Rock Band

title: 30 Minutes
body:
You are certain you love the man who will soon be your husband, right?

Plans Or Mistakes

You closed and locked the door behind you in the small room. You were immediately assaulted by hands, mouth and a body that pressed you hard against the wall.“How long until the party starts?” You…

Read more…

title: Hold My Girl
body:
Summary: (Bucky Barnes x Fem!Reader) Based on George Ezra’s Hold My Girl. So, a sad angsty drabble with a soon to be frozen Bucky and his s/o

Warnings: angst, mentions of needles

Word Count: 615

A/N: I was listening to Hold My Girl, and me and my bestie @gingerwritess started brainstorming what were the angstiest fics we could write based on this song. Here’s what I wrote, enjoy! ;)

A tear of mixed emotions slid down your cheek. Looking at Bucky, in all white, trying to pure himself from his past and his sad smile barely allowed you to keep it together.

He had his hands held limply in his lap in a sign of submission. His shoulders drooping forward, caving in on himself, but a hopeful look shining in his eyes.

Doctors scurried around, nurses injecting Bucky different medicines in preparation through an IV. The whole time he held eye contact with you, his pools of ocean blue never wavering from your own eyes. In his eyes, you could see the horror from his memories reflected in the sadness you found there. It wasn’t leaving him alone. That’s why the cryo was needed. Though you desperately wished that wasn’t true.

You smiled back to him, trying to convey all your support, but another tear slipped from your watery eyes. Bucky cocked his head, frowning before lifting his one hand to your face, wordlessly wiping it off. No words were needed. He felt that you knew. He could feel it.

Silence continued to be shared between the two of you, the quiet love never wavering. You held his hand with yours, rubbing soothing circles with your thumb. You could see him starting to tense up when the doctors started to get faster, started to get closer.

His eyes wandered to the syringes they continued to fill and measure, the time was approaching sooner. With your free hand, you held his chin, pulling his face back to look at you. He flashed you a small smile of gratitude before calming under your touch. You fingers started to play with his scruff, the repetitive motion settling Bucky’s building nerves.

Nothing could be done thought, when the doctors told him they were ready for the final shot before he would be placed in the chamber. Fear coursed through his eyes, they flashed pleadingly up to yours, screaming at you to help him. It broke your heart. You squeezed his hand one last time, before letting go. Your hands, now cold but containing the memory of Bucky’s warm hand, were limply held at your sides. They begged to be held by his warm palm again.

More tears slowly fell from your face, and you tried to wipe them away before he could see them. When he flinched slightly at the last injection, it felt like your heart had been ripped in two. The doctors told him the last step was here. He just was to be placed in the chamber. You took a step back as two doctors helped him to his feet, and when they started to guide him to the chamber, he stopped.

“Give me a minute to hold my girl”

Sluggishly, he walked to you on his own, wrapping you in his arms. His hand found the back of your head, his fingers weaving there way through your hair. He buried his face into your neck, inhaling deeply, the scent of you fresh in his mind.

You clung to him tightly, your arms holding his midsection like it might actually keep him here with you. Now, you were unable to keep the tears at bay. They flowed freely. Pressing your face into his chest, it felt like a piece of your heart was already missing.

When the doctors said it was time, he placed a delicate kiss on the top of your head, before pulling you away.

When he had situated himself into the chamber, and before the cold air would blow in, he flashed you a sad smile, a smile that would haunt you for days to come.

Mutuals:

(I’m gonna start tagging all my mutuals in my fics, if you don’t want to be tagged, just let me know!)

@gingerwritess

@spidermanswifi

@feistybaby

@agentbucky

@twentyonewinchesters

@fratboievans

@imthemishamigo

A/N: I was listening to Hold My Girl, and me and my bestie @gingerwritess started brainstorming what were the angstiest fics we could write based on this song. Here’s what I wrote, enjoy! ;)

A tear of mixed emotions slid down your cheek. Looking at Bucky, in all white, trying to pure himself from his past and his sad smile barely allowed you to keep it together.

He had his hands held limply in his lap in a sign of submission. His shoulders drooping forward, caving in on himself, but a hopeful look shining in his eyes.

[[MORE]]

Doctors scurried around, nurses injecting Bucky different medicines in preparation through an IV. The whole time he held eye contact with you, his pools of ocean blue never wavering from your own eyes. In his eyes, you could see the horror from his memories reflected in the sadness you found there. It wasn’t leaving him alone. That’s why the cryo was needed. Though you desperately wished that wasn’t true.

You smiled back to him, trying to convey all your support, but another tear slipped from your watery eyes. Bucky cocked his head, frowning before lifting his one hand to your face, wordlessly wiping it off. No words were needed. He felt that you knew. He could feel it.

Silence continued to be shared between the two of you, the quiet love never wavering. You held his hand with yours, rubbing soothing circles with your thumb. You could see him starting to tense up when the doctors started to get faster, started to get closer.

His eyes wandered to the syringes they continued to fill and measure, the time was approaching sooner. With your free hand, you held his chin, pulling his face back to look at you. He flashed you a small smile of gratitude before calming under your touch. You fingers started to play with his scruff, the repetitive motion settling Bucky’s building nerves.

Nothing could be done thought, when the doctors told him they were ready for the final shot before he would be placed in the chamber. Fear coursed through his eyes, they flashed pleadingly up to yours, screaming at you to help him. It broke your heart. You squeezed his hand one last time, before letting go. Your hands, now cold but containing the memory of Bucky’s warm hand, were limply held at your sides. They begged to be held by his warm palm again.

More tears slowly fell from your face, and you tried to wipe them away before he could see them. When he flinched slightly at the last injection, it felt like your heart had been ripped in two. The doctors told him the last step was here. He just was to be placed in the chamber. You took a step back as two doctors helped him to his feet, and when they started to guide him to the chamber, he stopped.

“Give me a minute to hold my girl”

Sluggishly, he walked to you on his own, wrapping you in his arms. His hand found the back of your head, his fingers weaving there way through your hair. He buried his face into your neck, inhaling deeply, the scent of you fresh in his mind.

You clung to him tightly, your arms holding his midsection like it might actually keep him here with you. Now, you were unable to keep the tears at bay. They flowed freely. Pressing your face into his chest, it felt like a piece of your heart was already missing.

When the doctors said it was time, he placed a delicate kiss on the top of your head, before pulling you away.

When he had situated himself into the chamber, and before the cold air would blow in, he flashed you a sad smile, a smile that would haunt you for days to come.

Mutuals:

(I’m gonna start tagging all my mutuals in my fics, if you don’t want to be tagged, just let me know!)

@gingerwritess

@spidermanswifi

@feistybaby

@agentbucky

@twentyonewinchesters

@fratboievans

@imthemishamigo
trail.content:
Summary: (Bucky Barnes x Fem!Reader) Based on George Ezra’s Hold My Girl. So, a sad angsty drabble with a soon to be frozen Bucky and his s/o

Warnings: angst, mentions of needles

Word Count: 615

body:
Fanfic Update Struggles: Pt. 1

THE EMAILS

How it’s supposed to go:

*sees email* oh shit ok cool imma read that later fo sho

How it actually happens:

*sees many, MANY emails* goddamnit I have work in 4.5 minutes *sucks in air of the fanfiction/speed-reading gods* OK LETS DO THIS BITCH

*opens link, sees 3k word chapter* *screams*
